Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Dubai Skyline Desert Safari Dubai Dubai Stopover &vert; 2 nights accommodation • Evening Desert Safari • At The Top Burj Khalifa admission • Return Airport transfers • Breakfast daily Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Dubai is a dazzling fusion of modern luxury and rich tradition, making it one of the world’s most exciting holiday destinations. Known for its iconic skyline featuring towering skyscrapers like the Burj Khalifa, Dubai offers visitors an unforgettable experience. From shopping in extravagant malls and indulging in world-class dining to exploring its beaches and the vast desert, Dubai truly has something for everyone. Whether you're seeking adventure, relaxation, or culture, this vibrant city never fails to impress. With year-round sunshine, luxury resorts, and a mix of futuristic architecture and timeless heritage, Dubai promises a holiday filled with unforgettable moments. Take in record-breaking views over the emirate and beyond, from At The Top Burj Khalifa, Dubai's famous outdoor observatory and lounge. Find yourself transported straight to Level 124 in the world's fastest double deck elevators, cruising at a speedy 10 metres per second. Take a closer look at the world far below through high powered telescopes, then step out onto the public outdoor observation terrace to marvel at the panoramic skyline. Get ready to experience the desert like never before. Leave the buzzing city behind as you’re whisked off to the beautiful and peaceful Dubai Desert, ready to deliver the best of what the dunes have to offer. Enjoy a thrilling dune drive, spotting local wildlife along the way, snap unbeatable photos at sunset, find your balance on a camel or a sand board and have your hands decorated in Henna to help the memories last longer. As you reach the magical campsite, you’re in for an evening full of awe-inspiring local entertainment and a delicious barbeque dinner under the stars. Sit back, relax and indulge in delectable foods and mesmerising performances. View more View less 2 nights + Desert Safari & Burj Khalifa entrance from $ 565 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until sold out Deal Includes 2 nights accommodation at chosen hotel with breakfast daily At the Top Burj Khalifa admission Airport to hotel return transfers Evening Desert Safari Evening Desert Safari inclusions Dune drive & Sunset stop Pick-up and drop-off in a 4 wheel drive BBQ dinner in a modern Bedouin-style camp Enjoy a variety of entertainment: Sandboarding, henna hand painting, Fire & Dance Show Unlimited water, juices & soft drinks Room Types 5-star Sheraton Dubai Creek Hotel & Towers Located on Dubai's historic waterway. Leading the way in revitalising the cultural and historic district of Dubai Creek and its surroundings, the hotel offers guests a look at ‘Life at the Creek’, encompassing everything that this notable area has to offer. 2 night package from $749 per person share twin Travel 01 Oct 25 - 30 Apr 26 2 night package from $565 per person share twin FREE upgrade to a Deluxe Creek View Room Travel 01 May - 30 Sep 26 4-star Novotel Dubai Gold District Situated in the heart of charming and authentic Dubai. The hotel’s prime location provides easy access to some of Dubai’s most iconic attractions, including the traditional Gold Souk and the Spice Market. 2 night package from $615 per person share twin Travel 01 Oct 25 - 31 Mar 26 2 night package from $489 per person share twin FREE upgrade to a Deluxe Room Travel 01 Apr - 30 Sep 26 4-star Voco Dubai The Palm Ideally located on the trendy Palm West Beach at the iconic Palm Jumeirah. The hotel has direct beach access and an infinity pool overlooking the Arabian Gulf. Walking distance to Nakheel Mall and Golden Mile Galleria. 2 night package from $809 per person share twin 20% discount on food & beverage at the hotel Travel 01 Oct 25 - 31 May 26 2 night package from $635 per person share twin 20% discount on food & beverage at the hotel Travel 01 Jun - 31 Aug 26 5-star Andaz Dubai The Palm Conveniently located on the trunk of Palm and opposite Nakheel Mall. Andaz has a private beach and a large pool, perfect for families. The free upgrade to Half Board meal plan throughout the year is unbeatable. 2 night package from $1149 per person share twin Guaranteed complimentary upgrade to Half board when booked on Bed and Breakfast basis. Travel 01 Oct 25 - 31 May 26 2 night package from $689 per person share twin Guaranteed complimentary upgrade to Half board when booked on Bed and Breakfast basis. Travel 01 Jun - 31 Aug 26 Based on 24 hours hotel check in/check out. Must book an Emirates flight to be applicable Terms & Conditions Sales until sold out. Valid for new bookings only. Must book an Emirates flight to be applicable. Pricing is subject to availability at the time of booking confirmation and may change without notice. Prices may vary due to exchange rate fluctuations. Advertised prices are person share twin in NZ dollars for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply. Hotels are based on 24 hour check in/check out. Hotel rates are inclusive of Service Charge, Municipality Fee and VAT. Tourism Dirham is not included and payable at the property. Free room upgrades are for specific travel dates as mentioned. Desert safari tour is not suitable for pregnant women or those with spine aliment. Entertainment may vary during Ramadan and other religious holidays. Children 0 to 4 years old can only be booked on private basis for the desert safari. Burj Khalifa is based on non-prime hours entrance. The Booking Confirmation is valid only for the specific date and time shown and shall automatically expire upon the lapse of this specific date and time. Children up to the age of 16 years must be accompanied by an adult at all times during the visit to the At the Top. No food or beverages are allowed At the Top. No large bags or strollers are permitted inside At the Top. Large bags and strollers should be checked at the Will Call counter prior to entry. Transfers - All guests arriving at Dubai International Airport (DXB) Terminal 3 will be paged by name after exiting the baggage claim area between exit gate 2 and exit gate 3, and will be directed to the Arabian Adventures podium within the Emirates Hotel Desk seating area. From there, Arabian Adventures team will assist them to the vehicle, waiting directly outside. Only 2 large and 2 hand luggage will be accommodated per transfer. Should the number of luggage be above this limit, a separate car will be required and charged to passenger directly unless prior arrangement has been made. Airfares are not included. Surcharges and closeout dates may apply. Amendment and cancellation fees apply . Payment deadlines and conditions apply. For full terms and conditions ask your House of Travel consultant. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options. HOT CODE: WEBDUBAI25 2 Nights + Desert Safari & Burj Khalifa entrance from $ 565 per person share twin.
